definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="get_command_parameter_entities_foreach"><field name="param">players</field><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:power_recovery_multiplier</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_command_parameter_number"><field name="param">count</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block inline="true" type="text_join"><mutation items="4"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The star points recovery multiplier is set to </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUND</field><value name="NUM"><block type="get_command_parameter_number"><field name="param">count</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> for </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
